### createMaskInstrs() {#a44f4e9b64d7a612f2b8236f0d147f591}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static PartwordMaskValues createMaskInstrs (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase">IRBuilderBase</a> &amp; Builder, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; I, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42; ValueType, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; Addr, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> AddrAlign, unsigned MinWordSize)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
This is a helper function which builds instructions to provide values necessary for partword atomic operations.

It takes an incoming address, Addr, and <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad18871060ac1b051c7322cc6ad71e11c">ValueType</a>, and constructs the address, shift-amounts and masks needed to work with a larger value of size WordSize.

AlignedAddr: Addr rounded down to a multiple of WordSize

ShiftAmt: Number of bits to right-shift a WordSize value loaded from AlignAddr for it to have the same value as if <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad18871060ac1b051c7322cc6ad71e11c">ValueType</a> was loaded from Addr.

Mask: <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> to mask with the value loaded from AlignAddr to include only the part that would&#39;ve been loaded from Addr.

Inv&#95;Mask: The inverse of Mask.

Definition at line <a href="#l00799">799</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/atomicexpandpass-cpp">AtomicExpandPass.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Emit IR to implement a masked version of a given atomicrmw operation.

(That is, only the bits under the Mask should be affected by the operation)

<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Convert an atomic store of a non-integral type to an integer store of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// equivalent bitwidth.  We used to not support floating point or vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// atomics in the IR at all.  The backends learned to deal with the bitcast</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// idiom because that was the only way of expressing the notion of a atomic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// float or vector store.  The long term plan is to teach each backend to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instruction select from the original atomic store, but as a migration</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// mechanism, we convert back to the old format which the backends understand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Each backend will need individual work to recognize the new format.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/storeinst">StoreInst</a> &#42;AtomicExpandImpl::convertAtomicStoreToIntegerType(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/storeinst">StoreInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This is a helper function which builds instructions to provide</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// values necessary for partword atomic operations. It takes an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// incoming address, Addr, and ValueType, and constructs the address,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// shift-amounts and masks needed to work with a larger value of size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// WordSize.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// AlignedAddr: Addr rounded down to a multiple of WordSize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ShiftAmt: Number of bits to right-shift a WordSize value loaded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///           from AlignAddr for it to have the same value as if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///           ValueType was loaded from Addr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Mask: Value to mask with the value loaded from AlignAddr to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       include only the part that would&#39;ve been loaded from Addr.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Inv&#95;Mask: The inverse of Mask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799" lineLink="#a44f4e9b64d7a612f2b8236f0d147f591"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PartwordMaskValues <a href="#a44f4e9b64d7a612f2b8236f0d147f591">createMaskInstrs</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase">IRBuilderBase</a> &amp;Builder,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad18871060ac1b051c7322cc6ad71e11c">ValueType</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Addr, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> AddrAlign,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MinWordSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/datalayout">DataLayout</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a> = M-&gt;getDataLayout();</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AtomicExpandImpl::expandPartwordCmpXchg(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomiccmpxchginst">AtomicCmpXchgInst</a> &#42;CI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The basic idea here is that we&#39;re expanding a cmpxchg of a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// smaller memory size up to a word-sized cmpxchg. To do this, we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// need to add a retry-loop for strong cmpxchg, so that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// modifications to other parts of the word don&#39;t cause a spurious</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// failure.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This generates code like the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &#91;&#91;Setup mask values PMV.&#42;&#93;&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %NewVal&#95;Shifted = shl i32 %NewVal, %PMV.ShiftAmt</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %Cmp&#95;Shifted = shl i32 %Cmp, %PMV.ShiftAmt</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %InitLoaded = load i32&#42; %addr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %InitLoaded&#95;MaskOut = and i32 %InitLoaded, %PMV.Inv&#95;Mask</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     br partword.cmpxchg.loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// partword.cmpxchg.loop:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %Loaded&#95;MaskOut = phi i32 &#91; %InitLoaded&#95;MaskOut, %entry &#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        &#91; %OldVal&#95;MaskOut, %partword.cmpxchg.failure &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %FullWord&#95;NewVal = or i32 %Loaded&#95;MaskOut, %NewVal&#95;Shifted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %FullWord&#95;Cmp = or i32 %Loaded&#95;MaskOut, %Cmp&#95;Shifted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %NewCI = cmpxchg i32&#42; %PMV.AlignedAddr, i32 %FullWord&#95;Cmp,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        i32 %FullWord&#95;NewVal success&#95;ordering failure&#95;ordering</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %OldVal = extractvalue &#123; i32, i1 &#125; %NewCI, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %Success = extractvalue &#123; i32, i1 &#125; %NewCI, 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     br i1 %Success, label %partword.cmpxchg.end,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        label %partword.cmpxchg.failure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// partword.cmpxchg.failure:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %OldVal&#95;MaskOut = and i32 %OldVal, %PMV.Inv&#95;Mask</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given: atomicrmw some&#95;op iN&#42; %addr, iN %incr ordering</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The standard expansion we produce is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &#91;...&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// atomicrmw.start:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %loaded = @load.linked(%addr)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %new = some&#95;op iN %loaded, %incr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %stored = @store&#95;conditional(%new, %addr)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %try&#95;again = icmp i32 ne %stored, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     br i1 %try&#95;again, label %loop, label %atomicrmw.end</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// atomicrmw.end:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &#91;...&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ExitBB =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a52c990590792c91dd20b6d45acebe359">splitBasicBlock</a>(Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a4e5c1b91bf5e2860398e3fa35c96b5af">GetInsertPoint</a>(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;atomicrmw.end&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;LoopBB = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a4a5b798214be930cf8e133c032ba0129">BasicBlock::Create</a>(Ctx, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;atomicrmw.start&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, ExitBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The split call above &quot;helpfully&quot; added a branch at the end of BB (to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// wrong place).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1263"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::prev(BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a0b4e7bee9b8575cc7db73329f1a561bd">end</a>())-&gt;eraseFromParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#ace45cae6925c65e9d6916e09dd5b17cc">SetInsertPoint</a>(BB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#abab736a0141f903dc32a6f48828ad908">CreateBr</a>(LoopBB);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1327"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a> = BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a1b4bf7c97cdc8159fd73d48063f0b250">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Ctx = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;getContext();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If shouldInsertFencesForAtomic() returns true, then the target does not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// want to deal with memory orders, and emitLeading/TrailingFence should take</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// care of everything. Otherwise, emitLeading/TrailingFence are no-op and we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should preserve the ordering.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShouldInsertFencesForAtomic = TLI-&gt;shouldInsertFencesForAtomic(CI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9bccbe67aaab722783ca4e7c504aaaa7">AtomicOrdering</a> MemOpOrder = ShouldInsertFencesForAtomic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  ? <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9bccbe67aaab722783ca4e7c504aaaa7a14194d0b2e6c6680067975517cd58eac">AtomicOrdering::Monotonic</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  : CI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomiccmpxchginst/#a1ac603480e5e3cf5e17c5e646aaebea1">getMergedOrdering</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In implementations which use a barrier to achieve release semantics, we can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// delay emitting this barrier until we know a store is actually going to be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// attempted. The cost of this delay is that we need 2 copies of the block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// emitting the load-linked, affecting code size.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ideally, this logic would be unconditional except for the minsize check</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1344"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// since in other cases the extra blocks naturally collapse down to the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// minimal loop. Unfortunately, this puts too much stress on later</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// optimisations so we avoid emitting the extra logic in those cases too.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1347"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HasReleasedLoadBB = !CI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomiccmpxchginst/#a91b66c93e687bd0ea2d74a896c09408b">isWeak</a>() &amp;&amp; ShouldInsertFencesForAtomic &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           SuccessOrder != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9bccbe67aaab722783ca4e7c504aaaa7a14194d0b2e6c6680067975517cd58eac">AtomicOrdering::Monotonic</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           SuccessOrder != <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9bccbe67aaab722783ca4e7c504aaaa7a993ca650a85e8e69b8f7eaa4809c4862">AtomicOrdering::Acquire</a> &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1350"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;hasMinSize();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1351"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1352"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There&#39;s no overhead for sinking the release barrier in a weak cmpxchg, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// do it even on minsize.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1354"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> UseUnconditionalReleaseBarrier = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>-&gt;hasMinSize() &amp;&amp; !CI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomiccmpxchginst/#a91b66c93e687bd0ea2d74a896c09408b">isWeak</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1355"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1356"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given: cmpxchg some&#95;op iN&#42; %addr, iN %desired, iN %new success&#95;ord fail&#95;ord</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1357"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The full expansion we produce is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &#91;...&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1360"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %aligned.addr = ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1361"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cmpxchg.start:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %unreleasedload = @load.linked(%aligned.addr)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %unreleasedload.extract = extract value from %unreleasedload</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %should&#95;store = icmp eq %unreleasedload.extract, %desired</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1365"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     br i1 %should&#95;store, label %cmpxchg.releasingstore,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1366"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                          label %cmpxchg.nostore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1367"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cmpxchg.releasingstore:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     fence?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1369"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     br label cmpxchg.trystore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cmpxchg.trystore:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %loaded.trystore = phi &#91;%unreleasedload, %cmpxchg.releasingstore&#93;,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1372"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                            &#91;%releasedload, %cmpxchg.releasedload&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %updated.new = insert %new into %loaded.trystore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1374"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %stored = @store&#95;conditional(%updated.new, %aligned.addr)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1375"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %success = icmp eq i32 %stored, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1376"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     br i1 %success, label %cmpxchg.success,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1377"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                     label %cmpxchg.releasedload/%cmpxchg.failure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1378"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cmpxchg.releasedload:</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1381"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %should&#95;store = icmp eq %releasedload.extract, %desired</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     br i1 %should&#95;store, label %cmpxchg.trystore,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                          label %cmpxchg.failure</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// cmpxchg.success:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     fence?</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     br label %cmpxchg.end</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1605"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Given: atomicrmw some&#95;op iN&#42; %addr, iN %incr ordering</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1606"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1607"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The standard expansion we produce is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1608"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &#91;...&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1609"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %init&#95;loaded = load atomic iN&#42; %addr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1610"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     br label %loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %loaded = phi iN &#91; %init&#95;loaded, %entry &#93;, &#91; %new&#95;loaded, %loop &#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %new = some&#95;op iN %loaded, %incr</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %pair = cmpxchg iN&#42; %addr, iN %loaded, iN %new</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %new&#95;loaded = extractvalue &#123; iN, i1 &#125; %pair, 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     %success = extractvalue &#123; iN, i1 &#125; %pair, 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     br i1 %success, label %atomicrmw.end, label %loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// atomicrmw.end:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &#91;...&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ExitBB =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><span class="doxyHighlight">      BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a52c990590792c91dd20b6d45acebe359">splitBasicBlock</a>(Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a4e5c1b91bf5e2860398e3fa35c96b5af">GetInsertPoint</a>(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;atomicrmw.end&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1706"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In order to use one of the sized library calls such as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1707"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#95;&#95;atomic&#95;fetch&#95;add&#95;4, the alignment must be sufficient, the size</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1708"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// must be one of the potentially-specialized sizes, and the value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1709"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// type must actually exist in C on the target (otherwise, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1710"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function wouldn&#39;t actually be defined.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1711" lineLink="#a6312845f74f9bb3101268e4598ae05a5"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a6312845f74f9bb3101268e4598ae05a5">canUseSizedAtomicCall</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1713"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: &quot;LargestSize&quot; is an approximation for &quot;largest type that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1714"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// you can express in C&quot;. It seems to be the case that int128 is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1715"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// supported on all 64-bit platforms, otherwise only up to 64-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1716"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// integers are supported. If we get this wrong, then we&#39;ll try to</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1832"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AtomicExpandImpl::expandAtomicRMWToLibcall(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/atomicrmwinst">AtomicRMWInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1833"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;RTLIB::Libcall&gt;</a> Libcalls = <a href="#aff1937512c312e6e175b1367b551a4a3">GetRMWLibcall</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getOperation());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1834"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1835"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = <a href="#aa54574a2cf0b638d4fee2b8ed962058a">getAtomicOpSize</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1836"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1837"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/disassembler/aarch64disassembler-cpp/#abdb086b34295fb7aa09493c62d798465">Success</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1838"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Libcalls.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#ac835b8735b1b2faec0efdca236e37d94">empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1839"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/lib/target/aarch64/disassembler/aarch64disassembler-cpp/#abdb086b34295fb7aa09493c62d798465">Success</a> = expandAtomicOpToLibcall(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1840"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getAlign(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getPointerOperand(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getValOperand(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1841"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getOrdering(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9bccbe67aaab722783ca4e7c504aaaa7a56a57d29a3f9dda8671b4d6490a94b08">AtomicOrdering::NotAtomic</a>, Libcalls);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1842"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1843"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The expansion failed: either there were no libcalls at all for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1844"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the operation (min/max), or there were only size-specialized</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1845"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// libcalls (add/sub/etc) and we needed a generic. So, expand to a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1846"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// CAS libcall, via a CAS loop, instead.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1935"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1936"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1937"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1938"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Build up the function call. There&#39;s two kinds. First, the sized</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1939"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// variants.  These calls are going to be one of the following (with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1940"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// N=1,2,4,8,16):</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1941"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  iN    &#95;&#95;atomic&#95;load&#95;N(iN &#42;ptr, int ordering)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1942"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  void  &#95;&#95;atomic&#95;store&#95;N(iN &#42;ptr, iN val, int ordering)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1943"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  iN    &#95;&#95;atomic&#95;&#123;exchange|fetch&#95;&#42;&#125;&#95;N(iN &#42;ptr, iN val, int ordering)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1944"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  bool  &#95;&#95;atomic&#95;compare&#95;exchange&#95;N(iN &#42;ptr, iN &#42;expected, iN desired,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1945"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                    int success&#95;order, int failure&#95;order)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1946"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1947"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that these functions can be used for non-integer atomic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1948"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operations, the values just need to be bitcast to integers on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1949"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// way in and out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1950"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1951"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And, then, the generic variants. They look like the following:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1952"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  void  &#95;&#95;atomic&#95;load(size&#95;t size, void &#42;ptr, void &#42;ret, int ordering)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1953"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  void  &#95;&#95;atomic&#95;store(size&#95;t size, void &#42;ptr, void &#42;val, int ordering)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1954"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  void  &#95;&#95;atomic&#95;exchange(size&#95;t size, void &#42;ptr, void &#42;val, void &#42;ret,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1955"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                          int ordering)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1956"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  bool  &#95;&#95;atomic&#95;compare&#95;exchange(size&#95;t size, void &#42;ptr, void &#42;expected,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1957"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                  void &#42;desired, int success&#95;order,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1958"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//                                  int failure&#95;order)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1959"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1960"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The different signatures are built up depending on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1961"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#39;UseSizedLibcall&#39;, &#39;CASExpected&#39;, &#39;ValueOperand&#39;, and &#39;HasResult&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1962"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// variables.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1963"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1964"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst">AllocaInst</a> &#42;AllocaCASExpected = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1965"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst">AllocaInst</a> &#42;AllocaValue = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1966"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/allocainst">AllocaInst</a> &#42;AllocaResult = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1967"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1968"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;ResultTy;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1969"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;Value &#42;, 6&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/key/#a1958a762261549463a280bac3274d6d5">Args</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1973"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!UseSizedLibcall) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1974"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note, getIntPtrType is assumed equivalent to size&#95;t.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1975"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/kernel/key/#a1958a762261549463a280bac3274d6d5">Args</a>.push&#95;back(ConstantInt::get(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getIntPtrType(Ctx), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1976"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1979"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// note: This assumes all address spaces share a common libfunc</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1980"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// implementation and that addresses are convertable.  For systems without</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1981"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that property, we&#39;d need to extend this mechanism to support AS-specific</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1983"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;PtrVal = PointerOperand;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2044"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a> = <a href="/docs/api/groups/arcopt/#ga9c9cf6ad55eb23d77d083a184e416c09">Call</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2046"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And then, extract the results...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2047"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ValueOperand &amp;&amp; !UseSizedLibcall)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2051"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The final result from the CAS is &#123;load of &#39;expected&#39; alloca, bool result</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2052"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from call&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2053"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;FinalResultTy = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getType();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2054"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ea5206560a306a2e085a437fd258eb57ce">V</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/poisonvalue/#a1bf08613fb664a2e377a9a72c59a6b66">PoisonValue::get</a>(FinalResultTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2055"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ExpectedOut = Builder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a3313ae2d314fb689cebdaf062d86eec5">CreateAlignedLoad</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2056"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CASExpected-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>(), AllocaCASExpected, AllocaAlignment);</span></CodeLine>
